image.title: Single image
image.helpText: An image with width and height between 50 and 250 pixels

imageList.title: List of images
imageList.helpText: A list of 0-10 images in which each image's must be 2:1 aspect and between 100x200 and 400x800 pixels

video.title: Single video
video.helpText: A video with width and height between 50 and 250 pixels

videoList.title: List of videos
videoList.helpText: A list of videos, each with width and height between 50 and 250 pixels

number.title: A number
number.helpText: A round integer between -10 and 10 inclusive

numberList.title: A list of numbers
numberList.helpText: A list of up to 20 numbers with no constraints on value

text.title: Bit of text
text.helpText: A text string between 1 and 50 characters long

textList.title: List of text blocks
textList.helpText: A list of 0-10 text blocks between 1 and 2000 characters long
